mdRecord.dcterms:description: ... a ranch outpost of Mission San Gabriel Arcángel in what is now in Redlands, California, United States. It was built to graze cattle, and for Indian Reductions of the Serrano people and Cahuilla people into Mission Indians. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/San_Bernardino_de_Sena_Estancia [work]
